ui.header_description: Diese Webseite ist ein Fanprojekt und nicht assoziiert mit dem Entwickler/Publisher hinter dem Spiel Ale Abbey.

ui.support: Hallo, ich bin der B(r)aumeister hinter Ale Abbey Rezeptrechner. Diese Seite bleibt bewusst frei von Werbung, damit du ohne Ablenkung deine perfekte Bierkreation planen kannst. Wenn dir das Projekt gef√§llt, freue ich mich √ºber deine Unterst√ºtzung f√ºr Hosting und Domainkosten.

Alle Marken, Grafiken, Spielinhalte und urheberrechtlich gesch√ºtzten Materialien geh√∂ren ihren jeweiligen Eigent√ºmern. Der hier bereitgestellte Code und die Anwendung sind eigenst√§ndige Fan-Entwicklungen und kein offizieller Bestandteil des Spiels.

ui.header_description: This website is a fan project and is not associated with the developer/publisher behind the game Ale Abbey.
ui.instructions: Pick a beer style and then select the desired color zone for each property or specify exact value ranges. Select all desired ingredients from the ingredient list. Then click on "Calculate recipe".
ui.results_empty: No solution found for the current constraints.
ui.results_placeholder: No recipe has been calculated yet. Use the form and click ‚ÄúCalculate recipe‚Äù to see results here.
ui.support: Hello, I am the creator behind Ale Abbey Recipe Solver. This site is intentionally free of advertising so that you can plan your perfect beer creation without distractions. If you like the project, I would appreciate your support for hosting and domain costs.
ui.support_note: Every contribution helps. Thank you for joining us!
ui.disclaimer: This website is a non-commercial fan project created for educational and entertainment purposes. It is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by the developer or publisher of Ale Abbey. All trademarks, game content, and related materials remain the property of their respective owners. The code and web application itself are fan-made and not part of the original game.

messages.min_exceeds_cap: Required amount exceeds the per-ingredient cap.
messages.no_intervals: No matching intervals for the selected bands.
messages.cap_too_small: Total cap is smaller than the sum of required ingredients.
messages.solver_failed: Something went wrong while calculating the recipe.
messages.solver_search_timeout: Stopped after exploring too many combinations. Try relaxing the filters.
messages.solver_search_partial: Stopped early after reaching the search limit. Showing the best results found so far.
